long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the help of this tool, you can use it as a media player in your browser.

It enables you to use any media player for formats like mp4, wmv, etc. It also allowing for easy downloads on PC, including Windows 7, 8, 10, and Mac.

How to use it?

First, you need to add our extension to your browser.
Now click on the extension icon to open its interface.
Here you need to Activate the Extension.
Now you can upload any media file and enjoy watching.
